1.4.1.name: wordpress/weather-for-us-widget
1.4.1.description:
By Installing this weather widget your users can see weather updates for their location on your website. You can get forecast, various units and really beautiful, eye pleasing weather status that instantly seeks attention of your visitor. This weather widget can either stay in your footer or you can put the mini preview version of weather widget in your side bars. The weather widget plugin loads from our optimised servers to server the best version according to users browser; thus the plugin feels as snappy as possible.

Skins

Currently Weather for us has 2 skins as we are working on more:

  • 720px wide large weather widget - that directly displays inline to place where you drop it. This widget is recommended for placing in your site or article footers. Excellent for embedding anywhere where you want a wide neat view and a clear focus on current weather conditions.
